text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this

to share with you one of my favorite

is just incredibly simple to do you need
less than five ingredients to make it
but it is phenomenal now the inspiration

favorite restaurants in Philly it's

Chef Jose Garces now anytime I go there
we always order the grilled chorizo is
one of our dishes because it's just so
simple it comes with like a little lemon
parsley oil and it really is simplicity
but at its very best and when we went
there for my birthday I had that plus
the marinated olives and then there were
